website_summaries.verdict: Big, accurate embroidery and a fairly secure clasp are standouts for this collar, which fits bigger cats well.
pros: Embroidered letters and numbers are good sized for the collar
Owners like that the embroidery can replace an ID tag
Many cats find them comfortable to wear and don’t try to pull them off
cons: Embroidery can be obscured when collar is adjusted
Embroidery is not sharp enough to easily read contact info
Collar’s clasp can break away too easily
May be too big to fit smaller cats

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and shipped fast!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on a Thursday and received my items on the following Monday. Very fast shipping for a custom item! Easy to read and the material feels sturdy. I have 2 cats, one that's pretty chunky and the other on the petite side and ordered the XS for them both and it seemed to be large even for my chunky cat; but it will work. As with other reviews, the numbers do get lost when you adjust it slightly. I think if they started the embroidery closer to the clasp it was help this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McClure

customer_reviews.title: Adjustment piece covers information on collar. :(
customer_reviews.text: Slightly disappointed with this collar. When adjusting it to fit my cat's neck, I ended up having to cover some of my phone number with the plastic adjuster in order to make it fit! This kind of defeats the purpose of having it written on there, wouldn't it? The stitching came out great, and it has a good contrast with the colors I chose (Black collar with Neon Yellow thread), but I'm very disappointed that the embroidered part wasn't shifted over to compensate for size adjustments. (My cat isn't extraordinarily small either - she's average sized, 7.5 pounds.)
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: This collar must be for very large cats.
customer_reviews.text: The embroidery is perfect and the colors represented on the site are accurate. The issue is that the smallest size is too big. (The smallest size being the smallest you can decrease the size using the adjustment buckle WITHOUT obscuring the lettering.) I can slip this color over my cat's head without any friction when set to the smallest size.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brick

customer_reviews.title: Not for cats. I call BS.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a collar for cats unless it has a neck circumference of a small to medium dog. I read this from other reviewers and took a chance. My cat weighs 20 lbs and it still didn’t fit. They give you the length of the collar, but fail to tell you that you have to cinch it up so far into the stitching that you can’t read it. They want me to pay for my return to make matters worse. Poor customer service and misleading advertising. Don’t buy this collar.
customer_reviews.author: amos

customer_reviews.title: Shipped Fast, and everything was just as we typed it in
customer_reviews.text: This shipped quickly and once adjusted it fits our cat very well. The only problem is the buckle covers part of the writing on the collar. I was able to arrange it so that it only blocked the area code on our phone number, which I suppose everyone around here will know anyway. There's really no way for the seller to know what size neck your cat has and where the writing needs to have extra spaces. I think if i reordered I'd try to add in extra spaces in the part of the text where the buckle is now. Other than that, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: J. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great option for our cats
customer_reviews.text: Great collars. Got them for my cats. They are adjustable and will adjust to very large. We initially bought them for our 11 week old kittens and it didn’t adjust down that far but they have grown into them nicely. With the embroidery it does make it harder to adjust. It makes the collar very stiff where there is stitching . So it’s harder to tighten and loosen but , it won’t loosen up on its own while the animal plays. The embroidery very legible and clear. They bells are still on the collars . No amount of rough housing seems to have been able to break them off.
customer_reviews.author: richard sullins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the orange with black lettering (my cat is outdoor only) and I love it! Hoping people won’t mistake my cat for a stray and/or not see her on the road. This collar should help keep her visible. I took the bell off as my cat is on my property for rodent control and I suspect to be more successful she needs to be in stealth mode. The bell was cute though. It’s nice to not have tags hanging off her neck also. Great product and would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: D. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Unclasps too easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for two kittens. One kitten got the collar off every day and chewed the buckle enough that was unusable. We ordered him a Pawtitas collar and he hasn't been able to get it off. We kept using the second kitten's embroidered collar and he's a lot weaker than the first kitten. Even he is able to get out of the collar it once a week. I don't work for Pawtitas, but their collars seem seem to be stronger and cheaper. I contacted customer service re: the unclasping problem and received no response.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Badly designed.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very large and the buckle goes over the number so 3 out of the 10 digits are difficult to read. Also the clasp is very loose, and the collar keeps falling of. I want to return an they tell me I have to pay for return shipping, which will cost me more than 1/2 of what I paid for this. Waste of money. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya S. Argirova

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, stitching and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Oh so very cheaply made. I can barely read the stitching. They have placed the lettering and number exactly where it's covered up by the size adjuster. All they would have needed to do is put the name/number all the way over to the latch of the collar, on the end. Putting it in the middle of the collar completely covers up important info. Also, the safety pull apart feature is ridiculous. It pulls apart if you barely tug at it. This would not last five minutes on a cat if it gets out. The cat could literally tug on it with its own foot and it pulls apart. Poor workmanship, poor design.
customer_reviews.author: S. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I little big for my cat, because, as others have pointed out, the adjustment buckle thing would obscure some of the phone number if adjusted properly. I would suggest in the customization field to put phone number first followed by name to insure phone is clear it is clear. other than that though, it does appear to be good quality. I think the company could resolve most of this issue by simply starting the embroidering as close to the buckle side as possible. As long as your cat's name isn't too long it would give another inch to inch and a half for adjustment of size.
customer_reviews.author: B_C

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but my cat won't have it!
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly thought I was going to get a five-pack. Didn't read carefully! Too expensive just for one collar, even though it's very handsome and the writing is easy to read. I didn't have any luck getting it on my cat, and because my cat roams a bit I figured it would be gone on his first trip out! With it being so expensive I didn't make further efforts. Had he been willing to wear it and had he been a homebody, I'd have used it to keep him from catching birds (thanks to the bell). My durability and sturdiness stars would likely be 5 star, but we haven't used it to know.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austen

customer_reviews.title: Clasps pop open too easily.
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats pops his open every day and it comes off. Another cat pops his open about every week or two. Another cat leaves his alone. All my pets are microchipped and my cats don't go outside, but I work in animal welfare and I know accidents happen and the fastest way to get your pet home is if it is wearing visible ID. I wish the clasps on these worked better. They look nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow

customer_reviews.title: Clasp keeps opening -- seller guarantees customer satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Collar nicely made, personalization correct. In less than 24 hours, the clasp opened twice and the collar was lost within my apartment. I had something similar a few years ago, where the clasp broke, but the quality of the collar was better. This one refuses to remain closed around the cat's neck. Disappointed since the clasp is not working. It ISN'T broken, but it isn't holding shut, either. ---> I do want to note that the seller offered me a refund or replacement for the defective collar, when I contacted them. I would VERY MUCH recommend the seller and their satisfaction policy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Adjusting the collar to fit a cat makes the ID info difficult to read.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea, and a great quality collar, but the position of the embroidery leaves something to be desired. The collar is quite large, and when it's adjusted to fit a cat, the plastic clip ends up smack dab in the middle of the phone info, making it difficult to read. Is there no way to start the embroidery in a different position? Also, the name was printed right next to the phone number (with barely any space in between) and looks a little strange given the blank space elsewhere. Nevertheless, I'm generally happy with the product as my cat's previous metal ID tag made a lot of noise.
customer_reviews.author: pizzapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve given these are good score for durability and sturdiness, this is actually the biggest problem with this product. The embroidery of your cats name and phone number on the collar actually make it very stiff and although they’re really cute and looks relatively decent, for me the rigidity of the colour make them unappealing. I’ve given these are good score for durability and sturdiness, this is actually the biggest problem with this product. The embroidery of your cats name and phone number on the collar actually make it very stiff and although they’re really cute and looks relatively decent, for me the rigidity of the collar make them unappealing
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ben W Scandrett Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well made collar!
customer_reviews.text: The color is bright orange, thus its name, and it has neon accents. Wish it had more space -- only enough room for a short cat name and phone number. Street address would be nice on the collar - but it would have to be thicker and my cat would not like that. Good collar and should do the job if he escapes again. My cat is an escape artist when people go in and out the door and always have to check where he is before opening an outside door. We have coyotes sometimes and he can't be an outdoor cat.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: CLASP DID NOT HOLD ! SELLER REFUNDED FULL PURCHASE !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the collar is excellent EXCEPT FOR THE CLASP ! I ordered 4 collars. Shipped fast. Everything was great but safety-clasp was noticeably weak. Tested one out (I have 5 cats) collar fell of and lost within 3 days. I'm out $64. I'll let you know what seller has to say ! UPDATE: Seller refunded full amount. If you have young active 'out-side' cats, clasp might not hold. They should offer a heavy-duty version to remedy this. Seller is TOP NOTCH and stood 100% behind product.
customer_reviews.author: StratCat

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for a simple "collar".  And the embroidery leaves a lot to be desired..........
customer_reviews.text: This took over 2 weeks to "process". When I received it, it's nothing but a "cheap 55 cent collar" with "overstitched" embroidery: there is very poor stitching on the collar, and it had to ALL be snipped with scissors so that the phone number could be read. Also, when properly fitted, the adjustment loop piece of plastic covers the phone number. That should be taken into consideration BEFORE embroidering the collar. At the price? It's not worth it, and the timeliness of the delivery was unreal. Slow boat to China? I suppose. I'd recommend you get your collars locally at your nearest Petco or PetSmart. Conclusion: Live an learn. This is NOT worth $18.95.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher715

customer_reviews.title: Breaks away as designed! Safe!
customer_reviews.text: My cat came in one day without his GoTag collar. Yay!! It broke away just like it was supposed to! I loved it. I previously had another collar that somehow my cat twice got his front leg caught in. Scared me to death when he limped back home. (He was fine after I got that faulty collar off him) After the 2nd time it happened (I felt awful &) looked for a different product. Apparently he had yet another adventure that compromised the collar, but the GoTag broke away and he arrived home safe and comfortable. Thank you GoTag! I appreciate the many color options too. 5+++++ stars!
customer_reviews.author: T. Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a bit pricey compared to the other type "ID" sewed collars, I know this will last a lot longer. I bought the other cheaper sewed in cat collar in Nov. 2019 and I'm already having to replace it cause our kitty managed to tear up the label that was sewed onto the collar rather than sewed into the collar. Big difference. We got orange which stands out well and although kitty would rather be without her collar, LOL, we believe she is safer with her new pretty collar.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Neon Orange For My Occasional Escape Artist
customer_reviews.text: Awesome collar, will keep ordering year after year. This is my second order for this cat collar- same color and lettering. After 2 years of daily use, my first one faded to a pastel orange, and grew stiff. The 2nd one arrived a bright neon orange, soft and flexible with a reliable clasp. My indoor cat loves hanging out in the garden, and sometimes he will wind up in the neighbors yard. I feel that this collar will get hime safely back home, if & when an escape happens!
customer_reviews.author: Zora Y

customer_reviews.title: Looks like our kitties are loved!
customer_reviews.text: If we get SO old we can't remember our cats names, we can read them on the collar! ha ha. Really tho, they're great, bright, tough, evidently comfortable. Plus in the dark we know kind of where they are from the little bell. If I had to say something bad, it would be that they were shipped thru USPS to us in Mexico. It took like 2+ months. But, we finally got them. Otherwise they were made and shipped promptly, it was the transfer from USPS to Mexico that took so long.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Two problems: 1) The cat collar size is way ...
customer_reviews.text: Two problems: 1) The cat collar size is way too large. It has to be tightened all the way down to fit which causes the lettering to be covered. I don't understand why it would be so large, someone using it at it's full size would need something wider. 2) The embroidery quality is not the same as in the pictures. There are threads that connect the letters together giving it a messy look. The pictures do not show this.
customer_reviews.author: tubular

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Collar!
customer_reviews.text: I have already ordered, and received, three cat collars from this seller, and I will be ordering three more. I am delighted with the product, and I think the idea of having the cat's name on the collar, not to mention the home phone number, is a great idea. I would recommend this seller to other people that want collars for their pets.
customer_reviews.author: L. Long

customer_reviews.title: Breaks away far too easily...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my teenaged cats because I wanted them to be able to go outside. The collars themselves seem fairly decent quality. The colors are good and they arrived quickly. The problem - both my cats ditched them in about 10 minutes, in the house, rendering them completely useless. The break-away latch is too good, I suppose. Definitely no chance of hanging kitties, but no chance of identifying lost ones quickly either.
customer_reviews.author: A. Polson

customer_reviews.title: Too big, too loud, not a breakaway clasp.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is NOT a breakaway clasp. Second, I wish these were offered in various sizes because even when adjusted to the shortest length, it was a bit too big for our cat. In fact, she got it stuck in her mouth and was in a panic trying to free herself from it. I'll also add that the bell on this caller is larger and much louder then the ones on the breakaway collars I purchased previously.
customer_reviews.author: ChristyMc

customer_reviews.title: writing is illegible, making this collar pointless
customer_reviews.text: The reason I wanted this cat collar was to have our telephone number sewn into the collar so the cat would not have to wear a dangling charm. The collar is too long for any cat, including my extra large Bengal cat. When adjusted for a cat-sized diameter, the buckle mechanism obscures the telephone number, which ruins the reason for buying this collar.
customer_reviews.author: auntnetta

customer_reviews.title: I know she'll be easily identified as an escaped convict
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the Oatmeal's Kitty Convict collar for my demon kitty, but I wanted something prettier for my Gixxy (plus orange on a black cat? Helllllloooo, Halloween). While she's not the run-off-into-the-great-outdoors type (more run-off-to-the-pantry type), if she does somehow escape, I know she'll be easily identified as an escaped convict, not a feral kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Beam

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of these products on amazon, but selected this one after reviewing and very happy with the collar. As others note it is long for a small cat, but it adjusted easily and there was still plenty of room to see the name and phone number. My cat is somewhat larger and 11 lbs. The breakaway works perfectly. The quality looks very sturdy. Tip: the embroidered area and seam areas are pretty stiff, I just shaped it and manipulated for a few minutes to make it nice and round.
customer_reviews.author: Ravinia

customer_reviews.title: Very rigid, way too long, lettering is covered by a buckle
customer_reviews.text: This one was a disappointment. 1) It's so rigid that when adjusted to the same length as the old collar, it choked the cat so much that he couldn't eat. 2) It's one-size-fits-all with so much extra strap folded over that it's basically doubled. Hence the rigidity. Probably made for a dog. 3) The buckle winds up in the middle of the letters, mostly because of #2. Will not be using.
customer_reviews.author: Akom

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a narrow cat collar
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is an adopted (by the cat) ex-feral cat whose daytime life is spent mostly outdoors. While I don't think she will stray, I ordered a collar with her name and out phone number on it. It is narrow, easy to read, and lightweight, so the cat does not seem to mind wearing it. I removed the bell and sewed it to fit and also removed the excess material since she is a small cat. An excellent product with an unlimited choice of color combinations.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Xplant

customer_reviews.title: Sassy Muffin rode 7 miles in car engine
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this Maine Coon for 3.5 months and she's already got lost twice. Thank goodness for this collar that brought her home. The first time Sassy Muffin got lost, she was driven 7 miles away in a stranger's car engine. She was sitting on top of the car battery inside the engine compartment when they found her! Luckily, they got my phone number from this collar. The second time Sassy Muffin got lost, she was gone for 12 days! She had ran across a six-lane highway, then got caught in some stranger's storage unit. The collar looks nice, is easy to read the phone number, and I like the bell.
customer_reviews.author: molly williams

customer_reviews.title: Very nice !!
customer_reviews.text: ordered embroidered cat collar.. It came quite quickly!! it seems very durable and the stitching was very very nice. I tested the breakaway collar several times by closing it then pulling on it. It does breakaway nicely on a good pull . It does not easily break off which is good . So far my cat it tolerating it , and I think it's adorable. The hardest part of ordering was deciding which color combo to choose from!!!! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: m.b.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but very long
customer_reviews.text: Good materials and craftsmanship. Our cat lost two collars I presume, by unbuckling the flimsy joints. This buckle feels stronger. Stitching is good. The bell is not too large as some others can be. The one problem with this product was the length. To for our 9-lb car we had to tighten it all the way which meant that it went around the neck twice. I cut the webbing in half, removed the plastic slider, and had to sew it back together t hand.
customer_reviews.author: Haris Subacius

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar
customer_reviews.text: Our collar arrived much earlier than expected, which delighted us. So far, even though it is a breakaway collar and our c at was able to take a previous collar like that off, Smokey has kept this one on. I appreciated the variety of color choices (we got pink with black type). The only downside is that a little bit of her name (part of one letter) is hidden by the one part when we tightened it, but you can easily see our phone number, and that is the most important. Would definitely recommend the collar and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Facie

customer_reviews.title: Great collars for cats!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our cats who like to wander out in the yard. The color lettering stands out really well on the black collar, and the quality is definitely great! I've had to reorder a couple more though because one of the kitties lost theirs in the woods - good to know it snaps easy enough when put under pressure and won't strangle your animal! The collars arrived in record time - way faster than the expected delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMama

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a collar with custom text and it got here pretty quick, all the way from the other side of the county. The embroidery on the collar is great, it's very clear and doesn't look like it's going to fray. I ordered a blue collar with neon green text for contrast, very easy to spot if my cat gets out. The breakaway buckle is solid enough to keep it on but not so much that it wouldn't come apart if the cat was stuck on something. It comes with a bell, too. My cat freaked out with the bell on but it was very easy to remove. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: William S

customer_reviews.title: Good product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchased for my cat. I was want to have more fancy collar With tag on my cat, but I tried and does not got the any good one, those are Break away collar either too hard to break away (it’s danger when it Stuck in cat's mouth) or too lose,I like this product could be customize and just easy to wear it and take off not too hard or lose. I recommend it for safety reason.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi Russell

customer_reviews.title: ID collar for pet
customer_reviews.text: I like this collar even though I don't let my cat outside. I use this collar on my cat whenever I am transporting him via public transportation to the Vet. He tolerates it well, even though he took the bell off within 10 minutes of wearing it. I choose a bright color combination to show off against his darker fur. This is just an additional precaution to prevent him from being lost besides chipping him.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. RandazzoTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Way too large for an adult cat....due to the placement of the embroidery
customer_reviews.text: Although the collar can be adjusted smaller - the position of the embroidery on the collar received will be covered/caught up in the adjustment....seriously flawed. A simple fix would be to reduce the TEXT size, and move/reverse the embroidery placement closer to the clasp (as the other collar) if the embroidery machine allows, so that the adjuster does'nt intersect the embroidery....unfortunately I will be returning because the collar is too large.
customer_reviews.author: NatalieL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This collar is stiff, does NOT break away easily, the writing is all smushed together, the adjuster covers the writing and the collar is HUGE so you WILL have to adjust it, and most distressing- the bell is attached with a large and jagged STAPLE. I removed the bell immediately for fear the staple would injure my kitten. I’m not impressed. AT ALL. Will be purchasing a different collar elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: vcsmiles

customer_reviews.title: Navy blue cat collar with bell
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great cat collar with large threading for his name and my phone number. Also has a cute bell. Was a great company to deal with. They reached out to me to suggest a brighter thread color for my navy collar, which was very professional. I picked the neon orange thread which looks great and really stands out. Awesome price, quality and super fast shipping. Would highly recommend this collar and company.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sager

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for ol buddy boy. He does go out. He was going thru the doggie door (5 dogs) anyway. So setup a little safe area where he could get out without being chased (from side of house). Bud can lounge there too outside. But yes he gets out. And this collar is good. Break away. I know he needs that as I have found his other collars around. So has a neighbor. This was very easy to customize and order. Came fairly quickly. Colors bright. Someone mentioned they thought it was big. I think perfect cat sized collar.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Collars!
customer_reviews.text: These cat collars are rather hard to find- the combination of personalization and being a breakaway collar. We take the little bell off for the cat's sanity and to avoid his alerting another animal he is there. He was a stray and can never be an all indoor cat. The only problem we have is that as an in and out cat, he does tend to lose them now and then due to the break away feature, but that feature probably saves his life if tangled in a bush, etc. They are a bit pricey but we always keep a spare here.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Good id
customer_reviews.text: I think the collar is sturdy. It is nicely sewn with my pets’ names. I do think on most of these types of collars, the bell is actually a hazard as the metal that holds it on the collar can be bent. That said, it is likely that a cat would release the collar before the bell could be caught and pried off. I very much liked the quality, but took off the bell as my cats didn’t like it. The release worked as it was supposed to without being too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Security, peace of mind, AND they are cute!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty collars arrived quickly, exactly as ordered. The material is great and the clasp is good. My kitties are blue eyed and so I got them the dark blue with light blue lettering and they are very easy to read. I love the bell so I can hear them at the back door, plus now the songbirds can hear them coming! I have pretty big cats, so my telephone number was not obscured when I adjusted them to size (just barely). If their necks were smaller, the phone number would be hidden, which would kind of suck. Still, if someone is close enough to read the collar, I guess they could just pop it off and open it.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Collars
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these collars for our new kittens (2 months & 5 months). They are a little big right now, but not so big they will fall off. They are set to the smallest they can be, so there is LOTS of room for growth. The kittens aren't scratching at them too much and they aren't getting worn where they are getting scratched. So far the kittens don't seem to care that they have them on (which is a good thing) and the embroidery is bold and easy to read in case they escape the house. Will probably buy the same ones again in a few years when natural wear and tear makes us need replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Zien

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Collar
customer_reviews.text: I had tried other collars before these and they broke away so easily that I was losing one or two weekly. I believe my cat crawls under fences and they pull off. It has been a year since I started using these collars and she has only lost two. This means they break away when necessary but not too easily. The colors and stitching are great and the width of the collar is just right for my petite, female tabby (not too thick or too long). I highly recommend these collars.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Great collars.
customer_reviews.text: This is the fifth Go Tags customized collar we've purchased. We have two cats - one geriatric boy who never gets into mischief, and a younger fellow who likes to lose collars (thus #4) - we will keep purchasing these as we need to. They are well made, the writing is clear on them, and they look nice. Our cats are indoor at night and indoor/outdoor during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelipup

customer_reviews.title: Bought two for my cats who enjoy being outside to make sure they had clear ids ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my cats who enjoy being outside to make sure they had clear ids while I was traveling and they had a cat sitter. It is true that the embroidered names and numbers cover the full length of the collar and so are partially obscured when adjusted to the smaller size of the cats' necks, but anybody would see that they have id on their collar and could easily get the necessary information to contact the owner should the cats ever wander far and get lost.
customer_reviews.author: CyprosTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful inexpensive collars that can make your kitty the talk ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful inexpensive collars that can make your kitty the talk of the area. The bell has a clear sound but it's not annoying. You basically don't have to put a tag on the collar because your name and number is already on there. It snaps off if it gets caught on something so your cat doesn't choke. There are two cons though. Sometimes the adjusting strap covers a number or letter on the collar. If you're lucky it gets between the spaces but most of the time it's on a number. Second con is someone tried to steal the collar because it was nice and put it on their cat. I guess you can't have something too nice~
customer_reviews.author: Therolyte

customer_reviews.title: Bad placement of stitching.. can't adjust collar small enough
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. The placement of the stitching makes it impossible to adjust the collar small enough to fit our large sized cat. Adjusted all the way to the end of the stitching, the collar slips right off her neck (she has an 8" neck!!). To make the collar small enough, we have to squeeze the stitching under the slider, which is way too tight - which places the slider half way over the stitching. What's the point of this collar? Don't understand why there are so many 5 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Technomadia

customer_reviews.title: Easy release clasp made these fall off my cat too easily
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but the first one disappeared from my cat's neck within a day, so I bought another one, which also disappeared. Maybe the problem is that the clasp is made to release easily enough so the cat doesn't strangle herself, but that seems to mean that it comes apart so easily that they don't stay on. I don't think my cat would have strangled herself if the clasp were a little stronger.
customer_reviews.author: D. Read

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar with clear embroidery
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice collar with our phone number very clearly embroidered around it. The cat wears it without trying to take it off, so I can assume it is comfortable! I think it will hold up well, though when he scratches it the embroidery may get fuzzy over time. Customer service was excellent, they contacted me to confirm my non-standard telephone number before making the item.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: This collar literally save my cats life. We recently moved into a new home and our cat got out of the yard. He was missing for 22 days before someone that feeds start cats found him 26 mikes away from home. He said I thought it was just a new stray that came around but then I saw his collar. It took him awhile to earn our cats trust but once he could get close enough he read the collar and called me! We were so happy we had found.
customer_reviews.author: Dog.mom.x3

customer_reviews.title: perfect collar and exactly what we needed for my collar ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect collar and exactly what we needed for my collar destroying wandering cat. he cannot have bells or anything hanging at all he goes crazy and he manages to rip off and chew all collars to bits, and itches like crazy if there is any metal at all. got the orange with navy writing (before convict collars were avail!!) and love that there is no bell, just the safety plastic clip and is adjustable. perfect on my beast and he doesnt even feel it. best purchase; if you want to save the time and effort and money from buying fancy collars that wont work, just get this one and save yourself the headache!!!
customer_reviews.author: carrot

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly fast
customer_reviews.text: This item from this vendor came incredibly fast....I was AMAZED, we had waited months for the same item from another Amazon vendor, Never got it! This item was here fast and seems good.... the only issue is our kitty was a stray and she is tiny for a full grown cat, and you would probably have to take the collar off her to read the phone number... next time for her I would probably just put the phone number. I Will be ordering from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: Good Product....
customer_reviews.text: My first one fell off. Or my sweet baby found a way to get it off. That's why my overall review didn't change for durability. I bought a second one, and feel much better with him running around with it. I use it more for body recovery because he is so shy no one could read it inless they were super close. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It is PERFECT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my cat's new collar! Some people are too picky...if an animal gets missing a person will move the clip to read the writing! I removed the bell because my cat is an outdoor cat and I don't want predators to hear him. His collar is black like he is and I got deep purple letters so the color would not be bright in the wild but if my neighbors picked him up they could still read it. It's perfect for your pet!!
customer_reviews.author: Houdini

customer_reviews.title: form over function did not work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two collars for two cats. Unfortunately the ease of removal by either grabbing the id tag hanging on the collar and pulling it off or just using the paw to remove it is very easy for both cats. The 'lock' is not fullproof. I solved the problem by looping a very small stay tie through the clasp and clipping the end of the tie. I adjusted the collar so they could pull it off over their head if caught on something. Also there is no place to attach a microchip tag, so I added a circle ring around the collar to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUSLY life saver and cute
customer_reviews.text: There amazing. What a clever product. I habe a cat who likes to run so this is perfect. I bought 3. 2 out of the 3 have stayed on..but its my fault. The 3rd cat is really smart.. He isnt a runner so idk why i even put one on him. But He not only has gotten it off..he hid it. Anyways...great buy. A few places faded fast where my cats have pulled and played. Ill order again tho!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlea

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect! I had already bought the dog version
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect! I had already bought the dog version, and decided to get the cat version too. The colors are nice, and it feels like good quality that will last a while. The cat collars have a jingle bell on them (so cute), but it drove me nuts at night time (kittens are 11 weeks old so night time is fun time) so I took them off... the collars are just as cute. Totally recommend the cat or dog collars for any pet owner!
customer_reviews.author: K Poore

customer_reviews.title: The cat gets it off easily
customer_reviews.text: The cat gets it off easily within minutes. I understand it should release with some amount of pressure, otherwise the cat my strangle himself, but it releases too easily. It's basically useless for our purposes. (Even if he got out with the collar on, he'd just pull it off probably.) Also it was huge, we really had to cinch it up, and it covers the phone number even those we put the phone number first hoping that it wouldn't. Otherwise it's lovely and I just wish the other problems were fixed. If so, I'd recommend it wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Olson

customer_reviews.title: A little long but high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really more like 4.5 stars. My only issue is that the collar is a bit long for an average sized cat. When I adjust it to fit my 14 lb boy, the last number of my phone gets covered. Otherwise, the embroidery is bold and readable, the clip is strong but will still come apart of the collar gets caught on something and, most importantly, he knows he is VERY handsome in it!
customer_reviews.author: Desert dweller

customer_reviews.title: Great cat collar - but take off the bell before ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cat collar - but take off the bell before you put it on your cat! It's just annoying for everyone, especially the poor cat, and it's unnecessary. The embroidered personalization is clear and easy to read, and lasts for the life of the collar. My cats have been wearing these for 5+ years and they still look great. The breakaway feature is essential in the event that your kitty every gets stuck on something (especially outside), so the collar pulls off and they don't choke. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Gremlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this brand. Needed leashes for my 3 year old kittens (3 cats.). The collars were easily adjusted and fit the kitties perfectly. I ordered these because name would be embroidered and also for break away safety collar. Arrived on time, The materials are of good quality and the attached bells are so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina@171

customer_reviews.title: good quality, fast shipping, a must for travelling pet
customer_reviews.text: nice embroidery, nice contrasting colors. If you saw any of the coverage ( or lack there of) of the Louisiana flooding and the heartbreaking scenes of all the lost dogs with no owners around you can appreciate what a collar like this would do in case of emergency. Thousands of lost dogs and no way to find out where the owner is. Many of the lost dogs had collars but no tags :( . This would solve that issue. A must for travelling with your pets as well. The quality was good and shipping fast. I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Fire it up

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVE WHAT YOU EXPECT !
customer_reviews.text: This kitty collar will arrive exactly as you ordered. The quality is perfect! The embroidery will last forever! I am very pleased with this kitty collar. I'm sure you will be pleased, too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: Broke away a little too easily....
customer_reviews.text: My boy cat Bob still has his. My feisty girl cat Kiki lost hers when she ran out of the house one day. Can' find it. These come off pretty easily. Best for a 100% indoor cat. (Even then, it comes off if they play a little rough). Also, the fonts are pretty big, so you can't see the entire name/number on cat's neck in one look. Maybe my cat's necks are on the smallish side?
customer_reviews.author: REalHousewife

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It's been over a year and half since I purchased this product and it is still sturdy and good as new on my cat's neck. I wanted a collar with my information in case my cat managed to escape from home but didn't want to burden it with heavy and/or large metal tags on his neck. This product solved that dilemma rather nicely. I would also like to note that despite this collar coming with a bell already attached, it wasn't too hard to detach it from the collar as I always found it silly and somewhat cruel to put a bell on your cat(indoor only cat that is). Overall, 5/5, would recommend any and all cat butlers.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great cat Collar
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the construction and lettering on the collar. the only issue I had was threading the collar to the right size with the lettering. the lettering makes the collar material stiffer so its more difficult to thread through the buckle. Ozzy the cat seems pleased as well. Its on him and unmolested for a week now.
customer_reviews.author: Matty B

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are good.
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that I understand reviews are important, however I am always frustrated that the requests come a day or two after I get the product. That said, I like the collars. They look like they will last more than a month, and the writing is easy to read. I cannot give any information on actual durability or sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Quirk

customer_reviews.title: great product at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: most liked: look just like the last one that lasted years. least liked: i was frightened by the idea a reindeer was following me back from the mailbox before i realized the little bells and not a hallucination produced that rhythm in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Gaylor

customer_reviews.title: Thank you to other reviewers. My kitten had no ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to other reviewers. My kitten had no issues with the collar.. Kitty is only 3 months old so I had to make the collar smaller by cutting it and overlapping about an inch in material. Used sewing machine as material is thick. It is so comforting to have contact info on him. He is chipped but this is more immediate info! Have ordered another two... Happy with collar.
customer_reviews.author: LoveFindingSolutions

customer_reviews.title: “Explorers” will be easily identied if found
customer_reviews.text: She’s microchipped and an indoor cat but, my Molly Quinn has her collar. It’s light weight, securely attached and a guarantee that she’s easily identified should she take a “journey” into the outside world. Her name and her human’s phone number is clearly visible and easy to read. I’d have no trouble suggesting it as a purchase for others.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Donohue

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two cat embroider cat collars with names and numbers. You could barely read the letters or numbers, the numbers were different on the two collars and the "release" broke the first time used. The quality is poor, the stitching uneven and the ability to make them smaller or larger left big gaps when doing so. I would suggest you find other products and do not buy from this company. Very disgusted. As a footnote, when I contacted them by email, they never replied.
customer_reviews.author: Sally J Sell

customer_reviews.title: Love this collar!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a black and white cat and purchased the orange with black writing. This is his third collar and I am so very happy with the purchase. I will be sending everyone who asks about his collar to this item. It also got here so fast and the quality is great. Some people complained about the orange not being the correct color, mine is bright orange.
customer_reviews.author: TXBoyMom24

customer_reviews.title: This is a great collar for my cat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great collar for my cat. The material is soft enough for her small neck and no worries about rough edges. I love the selection of colors and it is very easy to customize your own collar !! I now have one for all seasons. I also appreciate the fact that they can easily break-away (just as described). My cat already had one incident, and no worries about her getting "stuck". A very great product, very comparable price, and huge selection of colors. I would recommend to anyone wanting to personalize your kitty collar or dog collar too !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. RED

customer_reviews.title: Fitting Obscures Embroidery; Skeptical about durability
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and clearly embroidered. However, the slide fitting for adjusting the collar's length obscures the name or phone number on all three collars of 20 characters (7-letter name and phone number), when adjusted for an approximately-10 inch neck. The material seems thin (in depth, not width) and loosely knit. I suspect it may fray in just a few weeks. I used to buy embroidered cat collars that were of a heavier and denser material with an elastic section, no slide adjuster, and with regular buckle rather than breakaway buckle. Length was adjusted by cutting off the end. But I can't seem to find a cat collar of that quality anymore.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered a personalized breakaway collar for my cat who slips outside occasionally. It was terrible quality. After 2 months, the name (which was not embroidered) came off. So, there was no way anyone could call me if he was lost (though he is microchipped). This new collar is not only great quality; but, it is pretty. I love that I could choose any color combo I liked. I chose blue with neon green text. Fun and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. Pistoor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Collar, Large Legible Lettering, Adjustable with Safety Release
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, adjustable, and the lettering is large and legible. Although she has been micro-chipped, the fact that this collar is tolerated by my little kitty makes me feel so much better about her safety. I have had to replace the collar, because she climbs trees, but this just reinforces my opinion that the breakaway feature really works for my kitty.
customer_reviews.author: MCoyle256

customer_reviews.title: Great collars for your fur babies
customer_reviews.text: Really, the only thing I don't like about these collars is that the text gets skewed by the collar adjuster. If they were able to embroider these collars closer to the clasp that would prevent this, but I assume it is just how the machine that does the job works. Other than that these are well priced personalized collars, and their customer service is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Mangold

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind and Happy Cat, Too.
customer_reviews.text: We had a little "incident" involving an assisted escape in the city and an hour of terror before finding our loved one scared and ready to run in a dark, narrow, basement alley. Once home, we put on the collar we had, with a tag that had name and number, but he hated both the tag and the collar. So, this one was ordered. We managed to squeeze "indoor" into the collar as well as his short name and our number minus spaces. The collar went on without complaint and remains on. I recommend. He looks rather handsome in royal blue with neon green decor. (We, too, dumped the bell.)
customer_reviews.author: PMae

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar, little thinner than expected but works nicely and is good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, this is a nice collar. Little thinner than I expected but it's ok. My cat has never heard a bell before and he's bugging out about having one around his neck now. But he's getting used to it slowly. The writing is clear and legible. Kind of spendy but it works for what it's supposed to and it seems to be real nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Call me KID

customer_reviews.title: Breakaway Safety Release Buckle gives to easily.
customer_reviews.text: The collar was made well. The stitching was of good quality and the collar fit my cat well. However, within 2 days the collar was gone. Before putting the collar on the cat I had noticed that it did not take much to cause the "Breakaway Safety Release Buckle" to break free. It would come apart with VERY light pressure. I still put the collar on the cat and within 2 days the Breakaway Safety Release Buckle had given way and the collar was lost somewhere in the yard never to be seen again.
customer_reviews.author: Sendian

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this! My cat will not stay inside and he wanders - he's fixed but he likes to play with his neighborhood friends. Anyway, I put it on him last night, it came off after walking around for 5 minutes. Put it back on him readjusted it, which btw it does cover up the phone number. But this morning after being out all night it was gone 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service and Collar
customer_reviews.text: Awesome customer service and collar! I received my cat’s new collar in the mail this weekend, and when I opened it I saw I had accidentally typed one digit wrong in my phone number. I contacted the company to double check it was my mistake, and it was. Regardless of it being 100% my fault, they are fixing the number and sending a new collar. My cat has been wearing the collar since I opened it, and doesn’t even seem to notice it’s on her. It’s very easy to read, and looks very durable. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Comes off
customer_reviews.text: Timi has managed to pop the collar off twice! First time I thought perhaps the collar was a bit loose and she caught her foot in it while scratching. Tightened collar. This time..? No idea...but it was on the floor the next morning. I will put it on her when I let her go outside. Just not sure buying the collar will give me peace of mind if she follows a chipmunk out of the yard.
customer_reviews.author: SRBVa

customer_reviews.title: a little too easily opened
customer_reviews.text: The collar looks fine -- it's big for our 7 month old cat but will fit if we shorten it so that the name and part of the number is not showing. That's okay too. What I worry about is that the clasp feels a little lose for my comfort. I'm afraid it will be lost. But so far, so good. It's been about 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Roth

customer_reviews.title: Loved my cats collar so much I decided to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd order with this company. Loved my cats collar so much I decided to buy all 4 grand cats one for Christmas. They really are good if your indoor cat accidentally gets out. I’ve had mine brought back to me a few times now. A literal life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Lizinwood

customer_reviews.title: Please Do Not “Rescue” My Well-Taken-Care of Vat!
customer_reviews.text: After someone “rescued” my indoor/outdoor cat and he had been tattooed and vaccinated (again) by a vet did they finally scanned him for a the micro chip we had originally placed in him. Luckily he was identified and apologetically returned to us. How many pets are “rescued” and placed in new families when they aren’t lost at all?! I hope this collar with Pepper’s name and my phone number will be a solution to well meaning people. It took a bit for me to fit it so my cat couldn’t pop it off, but it’s stayed on now and is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Whitesel

customer_reviews.title: Quality collar
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! Charlie has a small neck, he’s 3 months old, So part of the adjuster was on the lettering, which is fine! You can still tell what it says. He hates it so doesn’t wear it, lol! But it’s a really well made collar-I’ll probably still use it to put on his carrier handle.
customer_reviews.author: Karebear70

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice. Ligut weight
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. Ligt weight, vivid colors, latch well, bell tiny but not crazy loud. My kittens are just too small to wear them yet (14 weeks), but it was fun watching them go nuts in collars for the first time. Another couple months and we should be all good. Be sure they fit snug before leaving your kitten alone wearing one. The photo shows what one of my brats looked like after going insane trying to rip it off.
customer_reviews.author: Oneadem

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, but too big for a cat’s neck.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Appears quite durable. Stitching is easy to read. However, they’re way too big for a cat collar. When adjusted to the smallest length, the plastic piece used for adjusting cuts off the animal name/contact information, defeating the purpose. Wish these were smaller and better designed for a cat.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Girl

customer_reviews.title: tel no is very readable
customer_reviews.text: If this one stays on the cat, I will be v. pleased. All the others have just disappeared. She does not mind wearing it and it is v. nice looking: my cat is black with white trim - just like the collar. Most important: the text is very readable unlike the stamped metal discs.
customer_reviews.author: marpaw

customer_reviews.title: Tommy the tomcat is protected,
customer_reviews.text: This collar is perfect. His name can never be misunderstood, he doesn't have any annoying tags hanging from his collar, and the black and white motif fits him, he's a seal point. He's only seven weeks old, so the collar doesn't quite fit, even as small as it can go, but i put it on him a little while each day to let him get accustomed to it. He looks gorgeous in it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats just doesn't like having a collar with tags dangling or even the ones that fit flat to the collar. She would always take these off. I thought I'd give these a try and she's been leaving the collar alone. I've tested the breakaway feature and it works fine. The embroidery is well done and, obviously, won't rub off like print would.
customer_reviews.author: DHH

customer_reviews.title: Well made and it does what it is designed to do
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. The collar itself is a standard breakaway cat collar, well-made and time-tested. The embroidery is clear and hey, they got all the characters and numbers right. The only issue for potential buyers is whether or not the item is worth the price paid, as one can find similar collars for cheaper. I think the quality here is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A. Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Breaks away far too easily
customer_reviews.text: We cannot use this collar. The break away is so weak that our cat separates it within minutes of me putting it on. In addition, the lettering over 2" from the end, so that the buckle assembly covers up part of the phone number. This was unfortunately an expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M Hufty

product_meta.title: GoTags Personalized Cat Collars with Breakaway Safety Release Buckle, Custom Embroidered Cat Collar with Pet Name and Phone Number, Adjustable Nylon ID Collar with Bell for Cat or Kitten
product_meta.description:
Our personalized cat collars are made and shipped from the USA in 1-2 business days. Our shop is in Washington state where are collars are custom made.

Our personalized breakaway cat collars are designed to keep your cat or kitten safe with a safety buckle designed to quick release your cat should their collar become caught. Custom embroidered ID collar personalized with your cat’s name and phone number permanently stitched into the collar ensuring your cat always has ID. Comfortable and cute nylon collar with attached color coordinating bell. Adjustable collar 8-12 inches in length x 3/8-inch-wide, for cats of all sizes, small to large, boy or girl. Orange, Pink, Red, Blue and Black cat collars, with 15 thread color options for your customized personalization. Durable, long lasting, and unique ID for your cat.

English alphabet characters only.

Please note: in some cases, when sizing the collar down there is a possibility that the adjustable slider could rest over some of the custom embroidery.
feature_bullets: Unique and long-lasting ID for your cat. Our personalized breakaway cat collar is designed to keep your cat safe with a safety buckle designed to release should their collar get caught. Comes with your cat's name and phone number permanently stitched into the nylon webbing. To see all our pet ID products, click on our brand name GOTAGS above the product listing title.
5 Collar Colors and 15 Embroidery Thread Color options.
Collar size is 3/8 inches wide and completely adjustable from 8-12" inches in length.
Durably made with comfort in mind. The nylon webbing has smooth, tapered edges for a comfortable fit. Great for cats of all sizes, small to large, boy or girl.

TO ORDER click CUSTOMIZE NOW and enter the following: (1) Collar Color: Black, Blue, Red, Pink or Orange (2) Thread Color: White, Black, Navy Blue, Red, Neon Pink, Baby Pink, Sky Blue, Purple, Neon Yellow, Neon Green, Orange, Gold, Turquoise, Cotton Candy, Jolly Rancher; (3) Collar Text: Cat Name and Phone Number - 22 Characters Max

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
